title: Active Sessions
description: Manage your active sessions across devices

revoke.title: Log Out Device
revoke.description: This will end the session on this device. The user will need to log in again.

revokeAll.title: Log Out All Other Devices
revokeAll.description: This will end all sessions except your current one. You will stay logged in on this device.

trust.title: Trust This Device
trust.description: Trusted devices may have reduced security checks

rename.title: Rename Session
rename.placeholder: Enter a name for this session
